ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: P: When I want to feel more positive emotion (such as joy or amusement), I change what I'm thinking about. C: When I want to feel happier, I think about something different.
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2=Disagree; 3= Somewhat Disagree; 4= Neutral; 5=Somewhat Agree; 6= Agree; 7= Strongly agree

ElementDescription: P: I keep my emotions to myself. C: I keep my feelings to myself
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2=Disagree; 3= Somewhat Disagree; 4= Neutral; 5=Somewhat Agree; 6= Agree; 7= Strongly agree

ElementDescription: P: When I want to feel less negative emotion (such as sadness or anger), I change what I'm thinking about. C: When I want to feel less bad (e.g., sad, angry or worried), I think about something different
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2=Disagree; 3= Somewhat Disagree; 4= Neutral; 5=Somewhat Agree; 6= Agree; 7= Strongly agree

ElementDescription: P: When I am feeling positive emotions, I am careful not to express them. C: When I am feeling happy, I am careful not to show it.
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2=Disagree; 3= Somewhat Disagree; 4= Neutral; 5=Somewhat Agree; 6= Agree; 7= Strongly agree

ElementDescription: P: When I'm faced with a stressful situation, I make myself think about it in a way that helps me stay calm. C: When Im worried about something, I make myself think about it in a way that helps me feel better.
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2=Disagree; 3= Somewhat Disagree; 4= Neutral; 5=Somewhat Agree; 6= Agree; 7= Strongly agree

ElementDescription: P: I control my emotions by not expressing them. C: I control my feelings by not showing them
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2=Disagree; 3= Somewhat Disagree; 4= Neutral; 5=Somewhat Agree; 6= Agree; 7= Strongly agree

ElementDescription: P: When I want to feel more positive emotion, I change the way I'm thinking about the situation. C: When I want to feel happier about something, I change the way Im thinking about it.
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2=Disagree; 3= Somewhat Disagree; 4= Neutral; 5=Somewhat Agree; 6= Agree; 7= Strongly agree

ElementDescription: P: I control my emotions by changing the way I think about the situation I'm in. C: I control my feelings about things by changing the way I think about them.
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2=Disagree; 3= Somewhat Disagree; 4= Neutral; 5=Somewhat Agree; 6= Agree; 7= Strongly agree

ElementDescription: P: When I am feeling negative emotions, I make sure not to express them. C: When Im feeling bad (e.g., sad, angry, or worried), Im careful not to show it.
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2=Disagree; 3= Somewhat Disagree; 4= Neutral; 5=Somewhat Agree; 6= Agree; 7= Strongly agree

ElementDescription: P: When I want to feel less negative emotion, I change the way I'm thinking about the situation. C: When I want to feel less bad (e.g., sad, angry, or worried) about something, I change the way Im thinking about it.
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2=Disagree; 3= Somewhat Disagree; 4= Neutral; 5=Somewhat Agree; 6= Agree; 7= Strongly agree

ElementDescription: Reappraisal factor, highest of all cross loadings
Reappraisal factor, internal consistency
Suppression factor, highest of all cross loadings
Suppression factor, internal consistency
Reappraisal Score
Suppression Score
